name: Tortoise Aquarium Free
description:
This is the best tortoise app.
- You can grow a tortoise.
- You can know growth of tortoise in real time.
- Operation is very easy!

Care is very easy. You should feed tortoise once every four days, and clean up only once a week.
Tortoise is very small at first, but it will grow bigger little by little every day.
Enjoy the growth of tortoise in your daily life!
